name: White Stag
description: A large celestial creature resembling a majestic stag, characterized by its divine nature and impressive antlers.
memorable: The White Stag serves as a beacon of divine will, with a curse mechanism for its death impacting its foes significantly.
goals: To protect the natural world and maintain the balance of nature.
relations: May be encountered alongside other celestial beings or within sacred natural areas.
strengths: Possesses agility, strength, and unique abilities to navigate difficult terrain and impact foes with curses.
weaknesses: Limited hit points make it vulnerable to concentrated attacks.
attacks: The White Stag can deliver a powerful gore attack and a hard-hitting hooves attack, showcasing its versatility in combat.
most_powerful_ability: Beloved by the Gods causes long-lasting trouble for the foe that slays it, cursing them with nature's wrath.
senses: Has a passive perception of 14, showcasing its adeptness at noticing hidden details.
skills: Excels in athletics, insight, and perception, indicating its ability to navigate challenges and understand situations.
additional_information: Can long jump up to 25 feet with a running start.
Travels through forests without penalty from difficult terrain.
Exhibits divine characteristics, representing its celestial origin.
Strong athletic abilities supported by a proficiency in athletics.
Exhibits an impressive blend of combat and exploration capabilities.
test_queries: celestial forest guardian with curse ability
large stag that protects nature and jumps far
divine creature that curses its slayer
agile celestial creature with formidable combat skills
mystical stag that navigates woods effortlessly
